channel.title: Testing on Jack Whiting
channel.description: Recent content in Testing on Jack Whiting

item.title: Beautiful, organised results in PHPUnit
item.description: PHPUnit Pretty Result Printer is a beautiful little extension for PHPUnit that cleans up and organises the output of tests. I’d highly recommend this for anyone using PHPUnit. For installation instructions visit the official repository https://github.com/mikeerickson/phpunit-pretty-result-printer.
